titleStmt.title: Relation of the publick, testimony of joy, shewn by Sir Gabriel Sylvius, envoy extraordinary from His Majesty of Great Britain to the King of Denmark, for the birth of His Royal Highness the Prince of Wales, the 12th of July, 1688

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones in the Savoy,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: broadside tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
